title: LF Top and Mid for Ranked 5's
body:
Looking for players within Silver V - Gold I.
We are a laid-back, brand new team, looking to climb the ladders of elo hell, gg.
Placement have not been done and will not be done until we have the final roster.
Willing to do scrims vs. other teams.
Ranked games will be played on a day-to-day or every-other day basis depending on the team’s schedule. Normal games will also be played.
Roles:
We're looking for an exceptionally good mid laner who's able to take control of the game and roams at appropriate times whether to help a lane or the jungler.
Top lane is also available at the moment. We’re looking for someone who can be reliable in the top lane. One who isn’t too reliant on ganks, so our jungler can prioritize our carry lanes.
Requirements:
MUST BE ABLE TO TAKE CONSTRUCTIVE CRITICISM
You must have a good champion pool for your role.
Must be able to consistently perform well in your lane.
Must be able to adapt to fit team compositions.
Must be able to synergize with the team.
Reliable internet and a good microphone.
Time to work with team.
All players will be looked at equally. If you are someone who looks down upon other players or is toxic during matches, this is not the right team for you.
Communication:
We’re planning on using Curse Voice for communication means. It is necessary to have Curse Voice and a microphone.
Team Roster:
Top:
Jungle: Swagner94 [Silver IV]
Mid:
ADC: FallenMillennium [Gold IV]
Supp: IVIisterChief [Gold IV]

replies.body:
I'd love to try out for the top lane role!

My IGN is Stop And Jiggle, my main 3 champions are Lee Sin, Jarvan, and Shen! I do play a few others on a situational basis, my true main is lee sin and he has been my main for about a year and a half.

Edit: I main these mobility based champs so me being ganked isn't an issue, meaning the jungler rarely has to show his face top.

Hey!

I would definitely like to try out for you! I've been playing since season 2 now and I want to get involved and play for a ranked team to improve as a player!!

IGN: LostBast
Availability: EST timezone evenings (6p.m. or later).
Age: 21
Role applying for: Mid
Champion Pool: Annie, Ori, Liss, Vel, Victor, Azir, Syndra, TF, I like the Mage style of play
Microphone/Curse/Ts: Yes!
Why I should be chosen?: I love playing the game and really want to take it to the next level. I'm a team-player and I can keep a cool head, I never surrender, nor do I cry!
I recently started streaming, it has more of an entertainment purpose though!
My one weakness: Maintaining high cs throughout the entire game (tends to fall off midgame), though I am actively working on improving it.

I look forward to receive a response in game!

-LB
